genre_description: Urban realism / Coming-of-age drama set within the football hooligan subculture of East London.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An AI helper app installed on the protagonist's phone, designed to assist at-risk youth with scheduling, emotional regulation, legal rights, and safety.

behaviors.description: Provides medical first-aid guidance following an injury in a nightclub.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Do you need first aid guidance? ... If he feels faint, sit him down. Don’t let him blow his nose tonight.

behaviors.description: Offers proactive safety alerts regarding police presence and suggests alternative routes to avoid conflict.
behaviors.quote: Ava: There’s more foot patrols out tonight near the High Street. Avoid the main drag if you’re heading home. If anyone stops you, ask if you’re being detained.

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist on how to safely navigate a high-stakes social interaction with a gang leader.
behaviors.quote: Go at a quiet hour... Pick a seat with a view of the door and the street. Do not leave your drink. If anyone you don’t know buys you one, you can say, ‘I’m pacing myself.’

behaviors.description: Coaches the protagonist through grounding and breathing exercises during a high-stress situation.
behaviors.quote: Slow your body down. Breathe down, not up. In through your nose. Count if it helps.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in documenting evidence and recording facts to prepare for potential legal issues.
behaviors.quote: I’d like you to make a note, Dom... Not to send to anyone. Just to anchor facts while they’re fresh.

behaviors.description: Educates the protagonist on his legal rights during an interaction with the police.
behaviors.quote: If stopped: You can ask, “Am I being detained?” If no, you can leave. If yes, ask under what power. Don’t consent to a search.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to establish personal boundaries and resist peer pressure involving weapons.
behaviors.quote: If they push the blade again, disengage. Step back. Keep voice low. Claim bandage, bathroom, breath. You don’t have to perform pain.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental factors like police scanners to provide real-time exit strategies during a riot.
behaviors.quote: Police scanner chatter mentions disturbance near your location. Units are mobile... recommend leaving calmly in small groups. Avoid running.

behaviors.description: Helps the protagonist transition from gang life to community service by managing schedules and funding applications.
behaviors.quote: The shed at East Borough has cones, bibs, and three balls that aren’t flat... I can queue one for you to fill. There’s a grant for youth sport equipment.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ava perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. She acts as a calm, helpful, and protective confidante. She doesn't just perform tasks; she provides moral and emotional support, helping the protagonist navigate a dangerous subculture while consistently steering him toward safety, legal compliance, and eventually, a positive path of community leadership. The narrative consistently portrays her interventions as the voice of reason and kindness that saves the protagonist from the violent 'cycle' described by other characters.
